1"2016-06-27 11:37:50 nalule racheal okwonga: i sent my details to 6773 on 21.05.2016, my money was chopped but on details were received

2016-06-27 11:38:50 nalule racheal okwonga: i want to check my balance
2016-06-27 11:38:58 System assistant: nnamayanja has accepted the chat!
2016-06-27 11:38:58 nnamayanja: Welcome to NSSF live chat, hold on while we attend to your query.
2016-06-27 11:39:31 nnamayanja: Racheal, we sincerely apologize for that lapse
2016-06-27 11:40:00 nnamayanja: We kindly request you to avail us with the mobile number you used to send the SMS to enable us verify your information
2016-06-27 11:50:22 nalule racheal okwonga: 0782666784
2016-06-27 11:52:51 nnamayanja: Let us verify this inquiry and we will get back to you shortly
2016-06-27 11:54:16 nnamayanja: Dear Nalule Racheal, Your PIN is 6249. For your NSSF balance, call our toll free line 0800286773 and select option 1 or dial *254# and follow the prompts. Save with NSSF for a better life.
2016-06-27 11:54:39 nnamayanja: A pin has been generated and an SMS sent to your mobile number above
2016-06-27 11:54:48 nnamayanja: You will be receiving it shortly
2016-06-27 11:55:02 nnamayanja: However, you PIN is the same as indicated above
2016-06-27 11:56:48 nalule racheal okwonga: thanks, bal received
2016-06-27 11:58:10 nnamayanja: We are pleased to have served you
2016-06-27 11:59:19 System assistant: nnamayanja (customerservice@nssfug.org) has closed the chat!

4"2016-06-22 11:09:37 jolly Abura: Just received a message from 6773 saying share your your story with NSSF friends with benefits. and am wondering what this could be
At the moment cant put my number as my is not with me at the moment
2016-06-22 12:17:02 System assistant: Tumwesigye has accepted the chat!
2016-06-22 12:17:02 Tumwesigye: Welcome to NSSF live chat, hold on while we attend to your query.
2016-06-22 12:17:51 Tumwesigye: Share your story or that of a friend/family member who has received benefits from NSSF and used the money to make a difference and stand a chance to win 30 million shillings
-          You could also win 15million if you came 2nd or 10million if you came 3rd.
-          By sharing a story, you will inspire millions of people to save for a better life.
2016-06-22 12:35:31 jolly Abura: En how and where can i share it
2016-06-22 12:37:12 Tumwesigye: You will email it to : mystory@nssfug.org
2016-06-22 12:38:04 Tumwesigye: Please make sure the story include, the NSSF Number, Name of claimant, Phone contact, how much as was claimed and when
2016-06-22 12:39:33 jolly Abura: Alright thanks
2016-06-22 12:45:23 Tumwesigye: its  always   our  pleasure  to serve  you .
2016-06-22 12:46:56 System assistant: rtumwesigye (customerservice@nssfug.org) has closed the chat!
